thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com
thread.title: Ian

author: Ian
title: Ian
text:
A friend referred me to OFX, as he had used them on many occasions and was very happy with their performance.
I read the reviews - which weren't very flattering - and made a decision to use OFX on his recco.
After logging online and going thru the process/s, I transferred a small amount (200 euros) from my Aus account to my Cyprus account.
No hassles, no dramas, very thorough and OFX kept me up to date with each step as the cash made its way across the etha.
Now that I know it all works fine, I will be transferring a few thousand euro across every month while my wife and I enjoy 12 months in the Med.
GO OFX!!
Cheers
